name: ispring4wordpress
short_description:
Powerpoint is one of the used Presenation tools.

Flash is the most installed Browser Helper.

To combine this to experiences and not to change the application ( Browser to Office Application ) it makes sense to converted Powerpoint presenations to Flash Presenations to show it inline at normal web pages.

For examples see blog.

But how to create those:

We use a free converter software from iSpring (http://www.ispringsolutions.com/products/ispring_free.html ) to convert. With the help of a wordpress plugin we can easily display those presenations on our Blogs.

Usage at Wordpress with installed Plugin iSpring:

id=nameXX src=/path/nameXX.swf?
